Package ru.nsu.fit.smolyakov.snakegame.view

Class ConsoleView

java.lang.Object
ru.nsu.fit.smolyakov.snakegame.view.ConsoleView
public class ConsoleView extends Object
Console view of the game. Uses Lanterna library.

Scene size is equal to the game field size plus additional 2 rows for the score.
